title: [Large-scale] Competency-based Learning Content Design and Implementation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with foundational e-learning tools, intermediate professional expertise in job-related social fields
context.additional_context: Practical training premised on the integration of existing LMS (e.g., Moodle) and legacy systems.

learning_goals: Learners can decompose the competency framework for social sector job roles into three hierarchical levels according to CBL (Competency-Based Learning) principles.
Learners design two or more blended learning scenarios for achieving competencies using an LD (Learning Design) template.
Learners implement methods to integrate existing digital tools with Moodle by applying the LTI (Learning Tools Interoperability) standard.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
